name: DogFight (itch) (TJ Yatchum)
description:
DogFight is an arcade style space shooter that tries to overwhelm the player. You control two ships, one with your keyboard and one with your mouse. Good Luck!

I made DogFight a long time ago in Processing using Java, and unfortunately, is not playable in a web browser, and needs to be downloaded.

Special Thanks:
Music: Eric Guadara (@eeease)
Art: Megan Calvente
